article: There are many stories about people who did not let age stop them in the pursuit of their goals. I'm sure you have heard of recent 70-year-old college graduates, or teenagers who are _ of many useful things or owners of companies. Actually, it can be done; it just depends on your attitude. Michael had wanted to run his own business from an early age, but he was _ a big risk taker. After many years of working for others, he put a business plan together and was about to make the _ , but his friends told him that at 45 he was too _ to start his own construction business. They thought it was a young man's business while Michael needed a steady income to support his family. Michael was discouraged. _ many of his friends worked in the very field that he was considering starting his business in, he _ that they knew what was best, so he decided to give up his _ . But his wife told him that he was foolish to do so. They discussed it and Michael _ that he'd been using his age as a(n) _ instead of as an advantage. Have you put off a goal because of age or another limiting factor? Does the limiting _ really have as much influence as you think? Age is just a number and each challenge is an opportunity. Your attitude _ . You're not too old to try something _ and never too old to give up on your dreams. They may _ a bit of adjustment, but if you want something enough, believe in yourself and your desires will have no bounds.
